Song.title: Z - John 1:1-5, 14; Hab. 2:20 (ESV) Christmas Resp. Reading

Arrangement.text:
Worship Leader: In the beginning was the Word, And the Word was with God, And the Word was God. He was in the beginning with God. All things were made through him, And without him was not any thing made That was made. (John 1:1-3)
Congregation: In him was life, and the life was the light of men. The light shines in the darkness, And the darkness has not overcome it. (John 1:4-5)
Worship Leader: And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, And we have seen his glory, Glory as of the only Son from the Father, Full of grace and truth. (John 1:14)
Congregation: The LORD is in his holy temple; Let all the earth keep silence before him.‚Äù (Habakkuk 2:20)
